= How to checkout code =

Source code can be checked out using 

http://code.google.com/p/gspring/source/checkout

= How to view code=
Source can be viewed using

http://code.google.com/p/gspring/source/browse

= How to build=

Project can be assembled using *maven2* build tool. It must be previously installed.

Command line:
{{{
mvn clean package
}}}


= How to run =

Build and copy WAR file to any servlet container

or

Simply run command line
{{{
mvn jetty:run-war
}}}
